features.title: BrandCrowd AI-based Business Name Generator
features.description: The ultimate tool to create a unique and memorable business name for your brand in just a few clicks! Our cutting-edge platform uses advanced machine learning algorithms to generate a list of potential business names that perfectly align with your brand's vision. Selecting the right name for your business is critical, and we understand that. Here's a small guide to help you choose the perfect business name:

items.title: Make sure it matches your brand's personality
items.description: Your business name is a crucial element of your brand identity, and it should reflect your brand's vision, values, and personality. The name you choose should resonate with your target audience, convey the message you want to communicate, and be aligned with your brand's overall marketing strategy.

items.title: Understand your Market
items.description: What product or service are you offering? Knowing your target audience will help you decide on the style of your business name. It's best to find a name that represents both your business values and your customer needs.

items.title: Make it Stand Out
items.description: A business name that stands out is one that is easy to remember. You want your customers to have your company at the forefront of their mind.

items.title: Keep it Simple
items.description: When choosing a business name, the K.I.S.S principle is crucial. An overly complex business name that tries to be everything to everyone often results in doing nothing. Shorter, punchier business names are often better.

items.title: Does it Work on a Logo?
items.description: Once you've generated a list of company names, our AI business name generator will show you how those names look on relevant logos. Our AI Algorithms will work out your industry and show logos suited to your niche.

items.title: A Killer Business Name isn't the End
items.description: Once you've got a great business name that is catchy, simple, and relevant to your market, start using it. Create the perfect logo, start getting social with Instagram and Facebook posts, and create memorable business cards - all quickly and easily at BrandCrowd.

howItWorks.title: How BrandCrowd's Business Name Generator Works
howItWorks.description: Finding the perfect business name is easy with BrandCrowd's AI powered generator. Follow these steps and you'll have a business name ready to share with the world in no time.

steps.title: Start Generating
steps.description: To generator your unique business name enter a keyword relevant to your business - our artificial intelligence powered generator will created business names tailored to you. Browse the business names and choose one you like.

steps.title: Refine your business name
steps.description: Can't see the right business name? No problem, you can generate more names by refining your search with more keywords or adjusting the business name styles.

steps.title: Bring your business name to life
steps.description: See how your new business name looks on one of our 137,000+ premium logo designs.

image.alt: Step 3 - Bring your business name to life

popularIndustries.title: Generate business names
popularIndustries.description: Choose an industry below and we'll start generating business names in seconds.

whatYouGet.title: BrandCrowd - more than an AI Business Name Generator
whatYouGet.description: At BrandCrowd, we are more than just a business name generator. We offer a full suite of branding tools to help you build your entire brand. Once you find a business name you like, you can use our design editors to create a logo, branded business cards, social media pics, banners, and covers. You can also put your new logo on stationery, including envelopes and letterheads.

items.title: Premium Logo Designs
items.description: Every logo in our library is uniquely handcrafted by professional designers from across the globe.

items.title: All The Files You Need
items.description: Get high-res logo files (PNG and JPG) for your website & vector files (SVG, EPS and PDF) ready for print.

items.title: Color and Layout Variations
items.description: Choose from several layout options and use any color for your logo design.

items.title: Business card Templates
items.description: Choose from thousands of business card templates, customised with your logo colors to match your brand.

items.title: Social Media Templates
items.description: Create social media designs including Instagram posts & stories automatically customized with your logo colors.

items.title: Brand Identity Templates
items.description: Create letterheads, email signatures matched to your logo colors to complete your brand identity.

items.title: Unlimited Customization
items.description: Edit the layout, colors and font on your logo. Get unlimited edits and create as many variations as you want.

items.title: Support
items.description: With 24/7 support from our team of logo experts, you're always looked after from logo creation to download and beyond.

items.title: Royalty Free Logos
items.description: Get a worldwide, irrevocable license to use your logo for any commercial and non-commercial purpose.

features.title: AI generated business names in seconds
features.description: In a matter of seconds generate unique business names for your business. Our advanced AI will take a description of your business and generate names that are relevant, memorable and align with your brand vision. Choosing a name for your business is one of the most important aspects of your brand - so we've created this short guide to help you select the right name.

items.imageAlt: Get the right business name for your brand
items.title: Get the right business name for your brand
items.description: There's nothing more important to your brand identity than your business name. A great business name needs to be unique, memorable and tell the true story of your brand's vision. Generate a business name that reasonates with your target market and get the right message to your audience with Design.com's AI business name generator.

items.title: Know your audience
items.description: Do you understand your target market? Do you know what they want and when they need it? Understanding these finer details can help you land on a business name that will absolutely resonate with them. Getting the style and tone right of your business name is crucial, and understanding how your audience behaves will help you get this right.

items.title: A business name that pops
items.description: Want to be at the front of your customers mind? You need a business name that is simple, easy to remember and makes a statement. When generating your business name, make sure you choose one that really pops!

items.title: Simplicity is key
items.description: Simplicity can be the key to an everlasting business name. Truly memorable brands have found success in business names that don't try to be everything at once. Ensure you make the right choice when you generate your business name - choose something simple.

items.imageAlt: Your business name on a logo
items.title: Your business name on a logo
items.description: See how your business name looks on a logo. With Design.com's advanced AI business name generator you can preview your business name on logos related to your industry.

items.imageAlt: Put your business name to work
items.title: Put your business name to work
items.description: Create a stunning logo with your new business name - then keep going by creating beautiful social media posts for Facebook and Instagram, brand kit and business cards. You can do it all at Design.com

howItWorks.title: How to generate a business name at Design.com
howItWorks.description: Simply follow the below steps to generate the perfect name for your business. Designs.com's AI powered business name generator will create a truly unique name in seconds.

steps.title: Describe your business
steps.description: Enter a brief description of your business and our state of the art AI will generate business names tailored to you.

steps.title: Adjust the AI output
steps.description: Not seeing a business name that stands out? No problem, you can tweak the output of our AI models by changing your business description or adjusting the business name style.

steps.title: A logo for your business
steps.description: Now you've landed on a killer business name, see how it looks on a logo. Our AI algorithms will show you logos tailored to your business - choose one you love and launch your business today.

popularIndustries.title: Generate a business name for your industry
popularIndustries.description: We've got business names for every industry. Find your perfect business name below:

whatYouGet.title: Get more than just a business name at Design.com

Launch your dream business with a suite of design tools to help you create everything from logos, branded business cards, social media pics, banners, and covers and more. You can also use your beautiful new logo on stationery, including envelopes and letterheads.
